GeneDef.label: ascend self
GeneDef.description: Causes the pawn to ascend to their next genetic form when ready.\n\nWarning: This will not carry over changes to their genes made during gameplay, their current genes are wiped and the new xenotype applied, the active genes will be encouraged to remain the same if available on both xenotypes.

GeneDef.label: ascend other
GeneDef.description: Causes the target pawn to ascend to their next genetic form when ready.\n\nWarning: This will not carry over changes to their genes made during gameplay, their current genes are wiped and the new xenotype applied, the active genes will be encouraged to remain the same if available on both xenotypes.

GeneDef.label: easy earned ascension
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene must earn their ascension through everyday work, proving themselves through hard work.\n\nIt's just a balance factor, don't overthink it. This variation of the earned ascension gene makes the experience gain much faster than normal.

GeneDef.label: earned ascension
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene must earn their ascension through everyday work, proving themselves through hard work.\n\nIt's just a balance factor, don't overthink it.

GeneDef.label: hard earned ascension
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene must earn their ascension through everyday work, proving themselves through hard work.\n\nIt's just a balance factor, don't overthink it. This variation of the earned ascension gene makes the experience gain much slower than normal.
